product.name: Cake Boxes
product.description:
Wholesale Custom Printed Cake Boxes Packaging

To preserve delightful cake products the manufacturers need firm packaging. Cake boxes give protection from moisture so the quality is preserved. PackagingAid is offering reliable packaging with high qualities and low prices.

We feel proud of the fact that we consider every cost-cutting aspect. From the manufacturing boxes to shipping at your doorsteps. We provide cost-effective solutions and charge wholesale prices for your custom cake boxes. Let’s have a spectacular experience of reduced costs and maximum savings.

Packaging & Food Safety

Package design and production play a vital role in limiting the shelf life of a food product. The right choice of packaging materials keeps product quality fresh.

Advancement in food packaging plays a central role in keeping the U.S. food supply among the safest in the world. Packaging retains the benefits of food processing after the process is finished. It allows food to travel reliably for long distances and still be nutritious at the time of consumption.

Packaging technology must adjust food protection with other concerns too. Including service and material expenses, emphasized environmental awareness. This is where Packaging-Aid cardboard cake boxes are beneficial. They give a perfect packaging box free of chemicals and contagions.

Quality Material Suppliers

The factor that requires prior attention is the cake box material. Corrugated cake boxes are made up of material that makes them ideal for massive orders. Kraft or card stock is ideal for food packaging. It comes in natural brown, unbleached, heavy-duty, and bleached white. The natural kraft is the most substantial.

No need to worry about the material quality as PackagingAid overcomes all your worries. By offering you the takeout boxes leak-proof and add multi-layered cardboard sheets that store your baked food. Airtight packaging protects it from getting rotted by hazardous factors

Cake Boxes With Display Windows

Want to display your gorgeous cake masterpieces? PackagingAid creates durable and presentable cake boxes with windows. You can easily display the quality of your products and the effort you took to create a lavish design. Unique outlook, which in itself is sufficient to heighten the beauty of the product packed inside.

These cake display boxes can be customized according to the requirements of the customers. You can also add windows cut in the shape of your choice. On your wedding day, you can order cake items as a sign of love. For sale for valentine’s day, the boxes take the shape of red-colored hearts with a PVC window.

Free Shipping

Worried about the shipping cost and handling? You don’t need to! PackagingAid offers a free shipping facility on every order of cake boxes wholesale to make sure that your product is delivered to you at your desired location without any harm. After ordering wholesale cake boxes you get your shipment tracking id from our client care department to check your shipment status.

Cake Boxes

Wholesale custom cake boxes are well-designed and used for this purpose. The packaging is composed in a way to cater to your demands.

PackagingAid.com is the name of affordability and premium quality. Digital Artwork and offset presses along with the latest methods secure the first-rated printing of cake products. We employ the finest materials for the manufacturing of our cake Boxes. Furthermore, our boxes are quality tested at multiple levels to secure their strength and stability.
